div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 90px; margin-left: 311px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 187px; margin-left: 572px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
create_pipeline()
1. Create new GST elements
2. Check GST plugin path
3. Customize GST elements' properties
4. Create empty GST pipeline, add elements to it
5. Link elements with each other following data flow
6. Create bus and connect several handlers
7. Set pipeline STATE = READY
Â

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 397px; margin-left: 572px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.div: 1. Get/set request id and media type
2. Choose whether to write incoming data to a file
(set pipeline STATE = PLAYING & push empty buffer into the appsrc)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 557px; margin-left: 572px;

font.div: 1. Copy data to a new empty buffer at 0 offset
